title: AMT TRAVEL WEB-APP
description: Full-stack travel insurance web application that allows users to search, compare, and purchase insurance plans tailored to their trips. Implemented dynamic quote calculations based on destination, trip duration, and coverage options. Built with React/Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS for a responsive and accessible frontend, and integrated Stripe API for secure payments. Features include user authentication, policy management, and a smooth, modern UI designed to optimize user experience. The project demonstrates expertise in building production-ready web applications with a focus on performance, usability, and security.
short_description: Travel insurance web platform with real-time quote calculation, secure payment integration, and responsive design.
technologies: Next.js, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, , SWR, Formik, Yup, Zustand
